docs.title: Student Information
docs.text:
Full Name: Nguyễn Duy Tùng Phone Number: 0352135763 Email: nguyenduytung.131005@gmail.com University: FPT University Major: Information Assurance Class: AWS

Internship Company: Amazon Web Services Vietnam Co., Ltd. Internship Position: FCJ Cloud Intern Internship Duration: From 05/01/2026 to na/na/2026

docs.title: Overview:
docs.text: This worklog documents my journey through the AWS Cloud Journey internship program, where I completed a comprehensive 12-week learning and hands-on project experience. The program was structured to progressively build knowledge from fundamental AWS concepts to deploying a complete, production-ready web application architecture on AWS.

docs.title: Week1 Objectives:
docs.text:
• Get familiar with the First Cloud Journey (FCJ) team
  • Understand AWS core services and learn how to interact with them via AWS Management Console and AWS CLI

docs.title: Tasks completed this week:
docs.text: No. Task Description Start Date End Date Reference 1 Meet and get to know FCJ members 2026-01-05 2026-01-05 Completed 2 Read and understand internship rules 2026-01-05 2026-01-06 Internal Document 3 Study AWS and its main service groups 2026-01-07 2026-01-08 Cloud Journey 4 Register AWS Free Tier account 2026-01-09 2026-01-09 Cloud Journey 5 Explore AWS Console 2026-01-10 2026-01-10 Cloud Journey

docs.title: Key Results:
docs.text:
• Understand AWS Fundamentals: Grasped what AWS is and identified the core service groups:
    • Compute
    • Storage
    • Networking
    • Database
  • AWS Account Setup: Successfully created and configured an AWS Free Tier account.
  • AWS Console Proficiency: Familiarized with the AWS Management Console, knowing how to search, access, and manage services via the web interface.

docs.title: Reflection:
docs.text: This week provided a solid foundation for my AWS learning journey.

docs.title: Tasks completed this week:
docs.text: No. Task Description Start Date End Date Reference 1 Cloud Journey 2 Cloud Journey
